results.title: Metformin alleviates ethanol-induced cardiomyocyte injury by activating AKT/Nrf2 signaling in an ErbB2-dependent manner.
results.text_hl: Thus, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be a potential novel treatment approach for @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002310 @@@alcoholic cardiomyopathy@@@.
